changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE file_metadata ( file_id bigint NOT NULL, deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, delivery_mode varchar(3) NOT NULL, time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, date_created timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_indexed_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_file_id_uc UNIQUE (file_id) );

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE timeseries ( deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, mean_latitude double precision, mean_longitude double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), time_deployment_start timestamp with time zone, time_deployment_end timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT timeseries_pk PRIMARY KEY (deployment_number), CONSTRAINT timeseries_geom_check CHECK (st_isvalid(geom)) );

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX timeseries_gist_idx ON timeseries USING GIST (geom);

changeSet.author: talend

NULL, "TIME_quality_control" character(1), "LATITUDE" real, "LATITUDE_quality_control" character(1), "LONGITUDE" real, "LONGITUDE_quality_control" character(1), "TEMP" real, "TEMP_quality_control" character(1), "TEMP_2" real, "TEMP_2_quality_control" character(1), "CNDC" real, "CNDC_quality_control" character(1), "CNDC_2" real, "CNDC_2_quality_control" character(1), "PSAL" real, "PSAL_quality_control" character(1), "PSAL_2" real, "PSAL_2_quality_control" character(1), "AIRT" real, "AIRT_quality_control" character(1), "AIRT_2" real, "AIRT_2_quality_control" character(1), "ATMP" real, "ATMP_quality_control" character(1), "ATMP_2" real, "ATMP_2_quality_control" character(1), "RELH" real, "RELH_quality_control" character(1), "RELH_2" real, "RELH_2_quality_control" character(1), "RAIN_AMOUNT" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_quality_control" character(1), "RAIN_AMOUNT_2" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_2_quality_control" character(1), "SW" real, "SW_quality_control" character(1), "SW_2" real, "SW_2_quality_control" character(1), "LW" real, "LW_quality_control" character(1), "LW_2" real, "LW_2_quality_control" character(1), "PL_CMP" real, "PL_CMP_quality_control" character(1), character(1), "VWND_2" real, "VWND_2_quality_control" character(1), "WDIR" real, "WDIR_quality_control" character(1), "WDIR_2" real, "WDIR_2_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD" real, "WSPD_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_2" real, "WSPD_2_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_3" real, "WSPD_3_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_4" real, "WSPD_4_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_MIN" real, "WSPD_MIN_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_MIN_2" real, "WSPD_MIN_2_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_MAX" real, "WSPD_MAX_quality_control" character(1), "WSPD_MAX_2" real, "WSPD_MAX_2_quality_control" character(1), CONSTRAINT measurement_pk PRIMARY KEY (file_id , index ), CONSTRAINT measurement_file_metadata_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES file_metadata (file_id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE ); COMMENT ON COLUMN measurement.index IS 'index of measurement in netCDF file';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS abos_sofs_surfaceprop_rt_map; CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceprop_rt_map AS SELECT m.*, i.url, i.size, t.geom FROM timeseries t JOIN file_metadata m USING (deployment_number) JOIN indexed_file i ON m.file_id = i.id WHERE delivery_mode = 'RT' ORDER BY time_coverage_start;
